src:
両陛下、大嘗祭リハーサル「習礼」に臨まれる

06 Nov 2019, 11:47

　天皇、皇后両陛下は６日、皇居・東御苑で、皇位継承に伴う伝統儀式「大嘗祭（だいじょうさい）」のリハーサル「習礼（しゅらい）」に臨まれた。本番は１４～１５日に行われる。
　両陛下は午後１時４５分頃、車で皇居に入られた。習礼は非公開で、東御苑に建設された大嘗宮（だいじょうきゅう）で行われた。宮内庁によると、両陛下は本番と同じ装束を着用し、所作などを確認されたという。
text:
Both Majesty's rehearsals for the Otsuki Festival “Apprenticeship”

06 Nov 2019, 11:47

The Emperor and the Empress attended the rehearsal “Shurai” of the traditional ceremonial “Daijosai” accompanying the succession of the throne at the Imperial Palace and East Imperial Garden on the 6th. The actual performance takes place on the 14th-15th.
Both Majesty entered the Imperial Palace by car around 1:45 pm. The apprenticeship was not open to the public and was held at the Daigokyu, which was built in East Gyoen. According to the Imperial Household Agency, both Majesty wore the same costumes as the actual ones and confirmed their work.
